page.title: 20A VILLAGE PENSIONER'S DAY
page.content: I rise at 6.30a.m., wash, dress and have breakfast watching morning T.V. and the weather! After taking my wife a cup of tea about 9a.m., I then work in my own garden but I also do 2 hours gardening a week each for several other people in the village. After lunch I sleep for a while then potter in my house and greenhouse until 5.30p.m.,when I take my car to meet my stepson from the bus at Isington. We eat our main meal at 6p.m., then relax, watching television, particularly sport,and I go to bed between 11 and 11.30 p.m.
